## Toolbox.deselectItem\_() method

Deselects the given item, marks it as unselected, and updates aria state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected deselectItem_(item: ISelectableToolboxItem): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | [ISelectableToolboxItem](./blockly.iselectabletoolboxitem_interface.md) | The previously selected toolbox item which should be deselected. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
